channel.title: Norihito Ishida's personal website
channel.description: Recent content on Norihito Ishida's personal website

item.description: Norihito Ishida Hello! I’m a machine learning engineer, data analyst, and ex-sheet metal engineer. Interests: Factory Automation Machine Learning Deep Learning Natural Language Processing Neural Processes Neural Architecture Search Computer Science AtCoder Languages Japanese / English Python, C, C++, etc. Education Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering, The University of Tokyo, 2011-2016 Affiliation Deepcore Inc. (Kernel member) Breadhouse Seminar Favorites Jazz, Funk, R&B, Soul, Neo Soul, etc.

Presentations Date Title 2020/07/19 The Neural Process Family 2020/05/31 ELECTRA(Clark+, 2020) 2020/04/13 分散表現, Attention, Self Attention, Transformer 2020/04/07 単語の分散表現(One-hot encode, word2vec, ELMo, BERT) 2020/02/03 NAS with Reinforcement Learning(Zoph and Le, 2017) 2019/11/11 NAS研究のベストプラクティス 2019/11/11 NASの歴史と現在の動向(Elsken+, 2019) 2019/11/11 NAS-Bench-101(Ying+, 2019) 2019/09/23 ASNG-NAS(Akimoto+, 2019) Technical notes Date Title 2020/04/11 Jetson nanoのケースを3Dプリントする(Ubuntu 18.
